title: Kraken Me Apart
description: When I threw a ring into the ocean, I was only humoring my best buddy's weird superstitions. But now it turns out that one of the monsters he wanted to protect me from thinks we're mates. Being accidentally married to a kraken is one thing, but the more I get to know Kirby, the less I can resist his strange charmsâ€”or his tentacles.
author: Alex  Silver
